full_summary:
# 2.15 Facilitator Consultant Requirements under the Task and Solutions Professional Services Method

### Announcement

The Department of Natural Resources Canada is soliciting proposals for the provision of Senior Facilitator Consultant services under the Task and Solutions Professional Services (TSPS) method.

### Description of Requirement

The Natural Resources Canada requires the services of a Senior Facilitator Consultant (Primary and secondary resource) to support the Department in its operations. The required level of security clearance is Canada Protected A - DOS?

### Eligible Suppliers

Only Supply Arrangement Holders under E60ZT-18TSPS who have qualified under Tier 1 for the 2.15 Facilitator Consultant category are eligible to submit a proposal.

### Invitation to Participate

ARTEMP PERSONNEL SERVICES INC, BDO Canada LLP, CIMA+ S.E.N.C., Ernst & Young LLP, Makwa Resourcing Inc. (in joint venture with TPG Technology Consulting Ltd.), Mobile Resource Group Inc, Performance Management Network Inc, Research Power (N.S.) Inc, Stratos Inc, TRM Technologies Inc, Turtle Island Staffing Inc, V42 Management Consulting Inc, Y2 Consulting Psychologists Inc./Psychologues consultants Y2 inc, Zernam Enterprise Inc have been invited to submit a proposal.

### Proposal Guidelines

Proposals should be submitted in accordance with the criteria outlined in the solicitation document. The proposed period of contract will be from contract award to March 31, 2025. The estimated level of effort is 45 days.

### Contact Information

For more information, please contact Serge Tshimanga at serge.tshimanga@nrcan-rncan.gc.ca or visit the Task and Solutions Professional Services (TSPS) website to learn about the Quarterly Refresh Cycles.

### Other Information

The Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) applies to this solicitation. A copy of the CFTA can be obtained from [reference URL].

### Notes

*   The Task and Solutions Professional Services (TSPS) method allows for quarterly refresh cycles. Suppliers interested in becoming a Qualified SA Holder should contact SPTS.TSPS@TPSGC-PWGSC.GC.CA
*   A copy of the proposal submission instructions, evaluation criteria, and other relevant information is available on the Federal Contracting Opportunities website.   Standing Offer Holders under this Process shall be able to be instructed to provide Senior Facilitator Consultant services subject to the requirements established in this solicitation.
